resources.text: The Family Helpline: speak with an attorney about CPS questions for free
Parent Resource Guide: a guide written for parents who have had their child legally removed by CPS in Texas
DFPS Statewide Intake: make a report about child abuse or child neglect in Texas.
Texas Foster Youth Justice Project: legal information and representation for current and former foster youth

resources.text: Office of the Attorney General Child Support Division: Apply for Services

Family Support Services through Texas Health and Human Services: find local programs
www.GetParentingTips.com: find articles, videos, and local resources funded through Texas Health and Human Services
2-1-1 Texas: find resources for food, health, housing, and more
www.FindHelp.org: find free or reduced-cost resources like food, housing, financial assistance, health care, and more

My Sticker Calendar: help your child track their visitation time with each parent
